title: Intergenerational Science Leadership Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in scientific fields and organizational management experience
context.additional_context: Cultivating the ability of managers over 40 to analyze generational learning characteristics through VR simulations and design collaborative learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can design customized science education strategies by analyzing generational cognitive trait differences.
Learners can build intergenerational knowledge-sharing systems using VR-based collaborative learning tools.
Learners can demonstrate science leadership competencies that integrate generational perspectives in project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
